description: {"blocks":[{"key":"74dn","text":"Part of the HTTM protocol dedicated to the extraction of gDNA from transposon mutated cell pellets. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

journals.name: PLOS One
journals.citation: Champie A, Grandmaison AD, Jeanneau S, Grenier F, Jacques P, Rodrigue S (2023) Enabling low-cost and robust essentiality studies with high-throughput transposon mutagenesis (HTTM). PLoS ONE 18(4): e0283990. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0283990

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7svgf","text":"Add  of lysis solution to each well of the deep-well plate and resuspend the pellet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dvhc3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"6754C33023E311ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t43t","text":"Prepare the lysis solution by adding   of proteinase K to   of homemade lysis buffer and mix well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"837n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"165","error":false,"guid":"29B37AD023E311ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"66","error":false,"guid":"2D14A73023E311ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ch4hk","text":"Cover with an adhesive aluminum foil and incubate at   for  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eq6rl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"828424C023E311ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"8059076023E311ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7coh","text":"While still warm, add  of ethanol 100%, without overmixing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gsji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bsd43","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"k9fq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"260","error":false,"guid":"20801EC0563B11ED9C6711A7A6865681","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"boo2k","text":"Overmixing will result in DNA agglomeration and difficulty with the extraction.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96v1f","text":"Transfer immediately to a deep-well plate fitted with an array of silica columns. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4udtt","text":"Centrifuge at    to eliminate traces of wash solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"3000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B5AF315D23E511EDACAA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3e64","text":"Add a collector plate between the silica column array and the deep-well plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nl7a","text":"Add  of low TE to the silica matrix in each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2jg0p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"E650526023E511ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgej0","text":"Cover with an adhesive aluminum foil and incubate at  for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6jdcf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"024A2FE023E611ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"00656A5023E611ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7v6r","text":"Put the contaminated silica array on an empty deep-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cfabc","text":"Add   of 1N NaOH + 0.15%(v/v) Triton X-100 to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1039e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"5541F6B023E611ED97F679CB4A21A98F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1qo6l","text":"Add   of 1,5N HCl+ 0,15% (v/v) Triton X-100 to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"90B9D2CB23E611EDACAA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ejd5","text":"Add   of 1N NaOH + 0,15%(v/v) Triton X-100 to each well. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"C3481DE023E611EDACAA0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c8cv","text":"Collect the flowthrough in a beaker. Neutralize pH if needed and dispose of the flow through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"79r89","text":"Silica columns array are ready to be reused. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
